name: Spiro
description:
Spiro is a solution for anyone who needs to perform breathing exercises. Whether it be those who suffer from respiratory illness, anxiety disorders, or even just athletes in training or SCUBA divers, all benefit from different breathing techniques. Spiro was developed in Unity and is designed to enhance it's users' focus on routine breathing exercises by gamifying the process. Users will be able to control a series of minigames with their breath, learn, practice, and perfect conventional mindfulness techniques. Ultimately, Spiro sharpens your focus, reduces stress and anxiety, prepares you for your day-to-day activities.
